signTx.gasLimitNotEnough: Gas limit is less than 21000. Transaction can't be submitted
signTx.gasLimitLessThanExpect: Gas limit is low. There is 1% chance that the transaction may fail.
signTx.gasLimitLessThanGasUsed: Gas limit is too low. There is 95% chance that the transaction may fail.
signTx.nativeTokenNotEngouthForGas: Gas balance is not enough for transaction
signTx.nonceLowerThanExpect: Nonce is too low, the minimum should be {{0}}
signTx.canOnlyUseImportedAddress: You cannot sign transactions with a watch-only address.
signTx.multiSigChainNotMatch: Multi-signature addresses are not on this chain and cannot initiate transactions
signTx.safeAddressNotSupportChain: Current safe address is not supported on {{0}} chain
signTx.manuallySetGasLimitAlert: You have manually set the Gas limit to
signTx.gasNotRequireForSafeTransaction: Gas fee is not required for Safe transactions
signTx.eip1559Desc1: On chains that support EIP-1559, the Priority Fee is the tip for miners to process your transaction. You can save your final gas cost by lowering the Priority Fee, which may cost more time for the transaction to be processed.
signTx.eip1559Desc2: Here in Rabby, Priority Fee (Tip) = Max Fee - Base Fee. After you set up the Max Priority Fee, the Base Fee will be deducted from it and the rest will be tipped to miners.
signTx.hardwareSupport1559Alert: Make sure your hardware wallet firmware has been upgraded to the version that supports EIP 1559
signTx.gasLimitMinValueAlert: Gas limit should be more than 21000
signTx.nativeTokenForGas: Use {{tokenName}} token on {{chainName}} to pay for gas
signTx.gasAccountForGas: Use USD from my GasAccount to pay for gas

gasTopUp.title: Instant Gas Top Up
gasTopUp.description: Top up gas by sending us available tokens on another chain. Instant transfer as soon as your payment is confirmed, without waiting for it to be irreversible.
gasTopUp.InsufficientBalance: There is not enough balance in Rabby's contract address for the current chain. Please try again later.
gasTopUp.hightGasFees: This top up amount is too small because the target network requires high gas fees.
gasTopUp.service-fee-tip: By providing the service for Gas Top Up, Rabby has to bear the loss of token fluctuation and the gas fee for the top up. Therefore a 20% service fee is charged.

swap.title: Swap
swap.pendingTip: Tx submitted. If the tx is pending for long hours, you can try to clear pending in settings.
swap.completedTip: Transaction on chain, decoding data to generate record
swap.InSufficientTip: Insufficient balance to do transaction simulation and gas estimation. Original aggregator quotes are displayed
swap.preferMEVTip: Enable "MEV Guarded" feature for Ethereum swaps to reduce sandwich attack risks. Note: this feature is not supported if you use a custom RPC or wallet connect address
swap.there-is-no-fee-and-slippage-for-this-tr: There is no slippage for this trade
swap.need-to-approve-token-before-swap: Need to approve token before swap
swap.this-exchange-is-not-enabled-to-trade-by: This exchange is not enabled to trade by you.
swap.QuoteLessWarning: The receiving amount is estimated from Rabby transaction simulation. The offer provided by dex is {{receive}}. You'll receive {{diff}}  less than the expected offer.
swap.by-transaction-simulation-the-quote-is-v: By transaction simulation, the quote is valid
swap.directlySwap: Wrapping {{symbol}} tokens directly with the smart contract
swap.tradingSettingTips: {{viewCount}} exchanges offer quotes, and {{tradeCount}} enable trading
swap.selected-offer-differs-greatly-from-curr: Selected offer differs greatly from current rate, may cause big losses
swap.low-slippage-may-cause-failed-transactio: Low slippage may cause failed transactions due to high volatility
swap.transaction-might-be-frontrun-because-of: Transaction might be frontrun because of high slippage tolerance
swap.recommend-slippage: To prevent front-running, we recommend a slippage of <2>{{ slippage }}</2>%
swap.tradingSettingTip1: 1. Once enabled, you will interact with the contract from the exchange directly
swap.tradingSettingTip2: 2. Rabby is not liable for any risks arising from the contract of the exchanges
swap.two-step-approve-details: Token USDT requires 2 transactions to change allowance.First you would need to reset allowance to zero, and only then set new allowance value.
swap.loss-tips: You're losing {{usd}}. Try a smaller amount in a small market.

rabbyFee.title: Rabby fee
rabbyFee.swapDesc: Rabby Wallet will always find the best possible rate from top aggregators and verify the reliability of their offers. Rabby charges a 0.25% fee (0% for wrapping), which is automatically included in the quote.
rabbyFee.bridgeDesc: Rabby Wallet will always find the best possible rate from top aggregators and verify the reliability of their offers. Rabby charges a 0.25% fee, which is automatically included in the quote.

lowCreditModal.title: This token has a low credit value
lowCreditModal.desc: A low credit value often signals high risk, such as a honeypot token or very low liquidity.

bridge.no-quote-found: No quote found. Please try other token pairs.
bridge.title: Bridge
bridge.pendingTip: Tx submitted. If the tx is pending for long hours, you can try to clear pending in settings.
bridge.completedTip: Transaction on chain, decoding data to generate record
bridge.need-to-approve-token-before-bridge: Need to approve token before bridge
bridge.aggregator-not-enabled: This aggregator is not enabled to trade by you.
bridge.recommendFromToken: Bridge from <1></1> for an available quote
bridge.loss-tips: You're losing {{usd}}. Try a different amount.
bridge.max-tips: This value is calculated by subtracting the gas cost for bridge.

confirmModal.title: Enable Trading with this Aggregator
confirmModal.tip1: 1. Once enabled, you will interact directly with the contract from this aggregator.
confirmModal.tip2: 2. Rabby is not liable for any risks arising from the contract of this aggregator

manageAddress.delete-desc: Before you delete, keep the following points in mind to understand how to protect your assets.
manageAddress.delete-checklist-1: I understand that if I delete this address, the corresponding Private Key & Seed Phrase of this address will be deleted and Rabby will NOT be able to recover it.
manageAddress.delete-checklist-2: I confirm that I have backed up the private key or Seed Phrase and I'm ready to delete it now.

manageAddress.delete-seed-phrase-title_other: Delete seed phrase and its {{count}} addresses

manageAddress.delete-all-addresses-and-the-seed-phrase: Delete all addresses and the seed phrase

settings.clearPendingTip1: This will clear all your pending transactions. This can help you solve the problem that in some cases the state of the transaction in Rabby does not match the state on-chain.
settings.clearPendingTip2: This will not change the balances in your accounts or require you to re-enter your seed phrase. All your assets and accounts information will remain secure.
settings.enableWhitelistTip: Once enabled, you can only send assets to the addresses in the whitelist using Rabby.
settings.disableWhitelistTip: You can send assets to any address once disabled
settings.clearWatchAddressContent: Do you make sure to delete all Watch Mode address?

whatIsASeedPhrase.question: What is a Seed Phrase?
whatIsASeedPhrase.answer: A 12, 18, or 24-word phrase used to control your assets.

isItSafeToImportItInRabby.question: Is it safe to import it in Rabby?
isItSafeToImportItInRabby.answer: Yes, it will be stored locally on your browser and only accessible to you.

seedPhrase.importQuestion1: If I lose my seed phrase, my assets will be lost forever.
seedPhrase.importQuestion2: If I share my seed phrase with others, my assets will be stolen.
seedPhrase.importQuestion3: The seed phrase is only stored on my computer, and Rabby has no access to it.
seedPhrase.importQuestion4: If I uninstall Rabby without backing up the seed phrase, Rabby cannot retrieve it for me.
seedPhrase.riskTips: Before you start, please read and keep the following security tips in mind.
seedPhrase.backupTips: Make sure no one else is watching your screen when you back up the seed phrase

guide.title: Welcome to Rabby Wallet
guide.desc: The game-changing wallet for Ethereum and all EVM chains

createNewAddress.title: Create New Seed Phrase
createNewAddress.desc: Before you start, please read and keep the following security tips in mind.
createNewAddress.tip1: If I lose or share my seed phrase, my assets will be lost forever.
createNewAddress.tip2: The seed phrase is only stored on my computer, and Rabby has no access to it.
createNewAddress.tip3: If I uninstall Rabby without backing up the seed phrase, Rabby cannot retrieve it for me.
